idea-plugin.name: RiverpodX
idea-plugin.description:
Boost your Flutter development with Riverpod! This plugin enhances your workflow by offering a set of useful tools specifically designed for working with Riverpod.
  • Code Snippets: Quickly insert Riverpod boilerplate code.
  • Widget Conversion: Seamlessly convert ConsumerWidget to ConsumerStatefulWidget with a simple action.
  • Goto Method for Generated Providers: Navigate directly to the method for generated Riverpod providers for quicker access to your code.
Perfect for Flutter developers using Riverpod, this plugin helps speed up your development by automating repetitive tasks and providing quick access to common patterns.
